Title: Relates to the amount of the indemnity bond or insurance required by common carrier ambulettes and paratransit vehicles
Summary: Provides for a minimum indemnity bond or insurance policy of $500,000 required by certain common carrier ambulettes and paratransit vehicles.
LawCode: Amd ยง370, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to indemnity bonds or insurance policies for common carrier ambulettes and paratransit vehicles
